item.title: Universal Music India Partners With Bollywood Hitmaker Maddock Films for New Label ‘Mad for Mussic’- Global Bulletin
item.description: MUSICAL MADDOCK Universal Music India has inked a strategic partnership with prolific Bollywood film production studio Maddock Films and its newly formed music label Mad For Mussic, led by founder Din
